title: Add Rajat's Equation logo to Hero section

requirements.summary: Generate the Rajat's Equation logo image from the uploaded file and save it to frontend/public/assets/generated/ as a static asset with appropriate dimensions for Hero section display
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image file is generated from the uploaded logo and saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/
Logo displays the mathematical square root symbol (√) elegantly integrated into the 'R' as shown in the original design
Logo maintains the dark navy blue color and serif typography from the original design
Logo file is optimized for web display with appropriate file size and resolution

file_operations.description: Generate the Rajat's Equation logo image from the uploaded file (rajat's eqn logo -1.jpeg) with dimensions 250x200 pixels for desktop display. The logo features a mathematical square root symbol (√) elegantly integrated into the letter 'R', with 'THE' in serif typography above and 'RAJAT'S EQUATION' in clean serif typography below, using dark navy blue color on light cream background. Optimize the file for web display.

requirements.summary: Update the Hero component to display the generated Rajat's Equation logo image at the top of the Hero section with proper sizing and responsive behavior
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is rendered in the Hero component using the static asset path from frontend/public/assets/generated/
Logo is positioned at the top of the Hero section with proper spacing and alignment
Logo scales responsively across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
Logo maintains visual clarity and proper aspect ratio at all screen sizes
No other Hero section content is modified except for logo placement

file_operations.description: Add the Rajat's Equation logo image at the top of the Hero section, positioned prominently above the headline. Reference the generated static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/rajats-equation-logo.dim_250x200.png. Set the logo width to 200-250px on desktop with responsive scaling for tablet (150-180px) and mobile (120-150px) using Tailwind responsive classes. Ensure proper spacing between the logo and existing headline content using margin utilities. Maintain the logo's aspect ratio and visual clarity at all screen sizes. Do not modify any other Hero section content including the headline, description, CTA buttons, PWA install prompt, or decorative banner.
